Karlsruhe B. Baden, Fremersbergstr 3

lg.label: Refrain 1
lg.l: so view Her mountains and valleys
her lakes so serene and so blue.

lg.label: Refrain 2
lg.l: of my childhood's serene happy days,
there softly the wind fans and plays.
